es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.GlobalRankingGreedyReranker

Packages that use GlobalRankingGreedyReranker 
Package Description
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking
Definition and implementation of reranking algorithms for enhancing global properties of the system.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.communities
Rerankers for enhancing global properties of the network related to communities.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.edge
Rerankers for enhancing global properties of the network related to edges.
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.graph  
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.user
Rerankers for enhancing global properties of the network related to users.

    class  GlobalRankingLambdaReranker<U,​I>
    Implementation of a greedy reranking strategy for optimizing global properties of the system.

  • Uses of GlobalRankingGreedyReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.communities

    Subclasses of GlobalRankingGreedyReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.communities 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CompleteCommunityReranker<U>
    Reranker that uses community metrics of the user graph.
    class  InterCommunityDegreeGiniComplement<U>
    Implementation of a global reranking strategy for balancing the distribution of the degrees of the communities in a community graph.
    class  InterCommunityEdgeGiniComplement<U>
    Implementation of a global reranking strategy for balancing the distribution of edges between pairs of communities.
    class  InterCommunityReranker<U>
    Global reranker for computing metrics that only use links between pairs of communities.
    class  InverseCommunitySize<U>
    Implementation of a reranker which promotes recommending links in small communities.
    class  ModularityComplement<U>
    Implementation of a reranker which promotes the modularity complement of the network.

  • Uses of GlobalRankingGreedyReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.edge

    Subclasses of GlobalRankingGreedyReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.edge 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  DirectEdgeMetricReranker<U>
    Global reranker strategy that optimizes the average value of an edge metric.
    class  EdgeMetricReranker<U>
    Global reranker strategy that reorders the candidate users according to an edge metric that we want to optimize.
    class  InverseEdgeMetricReranker<U>
    Global reranker strategy that minimizes the average value of an edge metric.

  • Uses of GlobalRankingGreedyReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.graph

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ClusteringCoefficientComplement<U>
    Global reranker strategy that optimizes the clustering coefficient complement of the network.
    class  DirectGraphMetricReranker<U>
    Global reranker strategy that reorders the candidate users for promoting a graph metric.
    class  GraphMetricReranker<U>
    Global reranker strategy that reorders the candidate users according to a graph metric.
    class  InverseGraphMetricReranker<U>
    Global reranker strategy that reorders the candidate users for minimizing a graph metric.

  • Uses of GlobalRankingGreedyReranker in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.links.recommendation.reranking.global.globalranking.user

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  OriginalDirectUserMetricReranker<U>
    Global reranker that optimizes the average value of vertex metric.
    class  OriginalInverseUserMetricReranker<U>
    Global reranker that minimizes the average value of vertex metric.
    class  ProgressiveDirectUserMetricReranker<U>
    Global reranker that optimizes the average value of vertex metric.
    class  ProgressiveInverseUserMetricReranker<U>
    Global reranker that minimizes the average value of vertex metric.
    class  UserMetricReranker<U>
    Global reranker strategy that reorders the candidate users according to a user metric that we want to optimize.
